curl:
        type: autotools-project
        plugin: autotools
        source: http://curl.haxx.se/download/curl-7.44.0.tar.bz2
        source-type: tar
        configflags:
            - --enable-static
            - --enable-shared
            - --disable-manual
        snap:
            - -bin
            - -lib/*.a
            - -lib/pkgconfig
            - -lib/*.la
            - -include
            - -share

mqtt-paho-py3:

        source-tag: v1.1
mqtt-paho-py2:
        plugin: python2
        source: https://github.com/eclipse/paho.mqtt.python
        source-type: git
        source-tag: v1.1

qt5conf:

ffmpeg:

orbis, --enable-libvpx, --enable-libx264, --enable-libx265, --enable-nonfree]
